nodes.text: Torpedo attack carriers were underwater craft that were equipped with concussion missiles and acted as protective support for Aquatic Terrain Armored Transports. During Operation Death-Hunter, several torpedo attack carriers were stationed at the underwater base on the planet Zeta Zero Nine. One such ship was commandeered by Rebel infiltrators and used to attack the underwater base. A bombardment of concussion missiles from the craft critically damaged the facility, causing the Imperial base to explode.
